SENT.plain: Two cases of full trisomy 22 with the associated gross and microscopic pathology are reported

These cases demonstrate the typical craniofacial and organ system anomalies previously reported in trisomy 22 but also exhibit uveal colobomas that, within the spectrum of chromosome 22 anomalies, are usually restricted to the so-called "cat eye" syndrome
The attendant microscopic ocular findings represent, the best of our knowledge, the first such report in the literature
